response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for us at $1,200,000. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers, we are excited to extend an exclusive opportunity to you. We propose to sell this exceptional item to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with a substantial advantage while ensuring a fair return for us. We believe this price reflects the true worth of the product and offers you a competitive edge in your endeavors. Should you be interested in exploring further details or proceeding with the purchase, please let us know. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
